explanation: [0-0] The video starts with two young men in a room with gray and white walls. The man on the left, wearing a brown short-sleeved T-shirt, sits at a white table with a pair of black glasses around his neck. He holds a silver tablet in his left hand and uses a tissue in his right hand to wipe the screen. A transparent cup filled with water sits on the table in front of him. On the right, a man wearing a white short-sleeved T-shirt and gray pants stands, holding a mobile phone to his ear with his right hand, absorbed in a phone conversation.

[0-3] He then walks to the table and places his left hand on it, revealing a black watch on his left wrist. The seated man puts the tablet and tissue on the table, looks up, and reaches out his right hand to take the phone from the standing man, then drops it into the cup. He then picks up the tissue from the table with his right hand. The standing man looks at his actions in surprise.
